data.title: Minimac4
data.description: a lower memory and more computationally efficient implementation of the genotype imputation algorithms in minimac/mininac2/minimac3.
data.name: Minimac4

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Here reference.msav is a reference panel (e.g. [1000 Genomes download](ftp://share.sph.umich.edu/minimac4/panels/g1k_p3_msav_files_with_estimates.tar.gz)) compressed with MVCF encoding,"
"Minimac4 is a lower memory and more computationally efficient implementation of the genotype imputation algorithms" (domain-specific imputation tool, suggesting a research lab project).

"A prebuilt Linux x86 executable is available at https://github.com/statgen/Minimac4/releases/latest by downloading and running minimac4-{version}-Linux-x86_64.sh." (distributed as an installer/binary).
